key_projects.title: AWS Infrastructure Rebuild
key_projects.description: Rewrote infrastructure as code (IaC) using Terraform/Open Tofu, integrated reusable modules with Spacelift, and optimized AWS deployment pipelines for cost reduction and scalability.

key_projects.title: Platform Stability and Automation
key_projects.description: Improved Togather's platform stability by addressing outages in Linux-based systems, automating pipelines, and resolving critical customer issues.

key_projects.title: Drupal to React Migration
key_projects.description: Migrated Drupal 7 architecture to Docker & AWS, creating CloudFormation scripts, Docker files, and ReactJS-based replacements hosted on Amazon S3.

key_projects.title: Monitoring Solution Development
key_projects.description: Designed and implemented monitoring solutions to track infrastructure performance and security, integrating tools like Jenkins and Bitbucket.
